text: "Heart and Soul" is a 1987 debut single by British band T'Pau. It is the leading single from their debut studio album Bridge of Spies. It went to number 4 in the United Kingdom, Ireland and the United States, number 1 in Canada, number 10 in Germany, number 9 in both Switzerland and New Zealand, number 18 in both South Africa and Australia, number 20 in Sweden and number 16 in Belgium. ==References== Category:1987 songs Category:Debut singles
title: Heart and Soul (T'Pau song)
